channel.title: Stylesheet not loading when page is reloaded multiple times
channel.description:
If you refresh the page/click links on the page quickly, the page just reverts to the browser's default stylesheet: http://i49.tinypic.com/149uypw.png any ideas of what I'm doing wrong? [code] Page Name
[/code]

item.title: Stylesheet not loading when page is reloaded multiple times
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

He should report that then, as all the results displayed from that google search abraham supplied relate back to jQuery or using @import to load the CSS file, Kihomura appears to use neither.

Read full topic
item.source: Stylesheet not loading when page is reloaded multiple times

item.title: Stylesheet not loading when page is reloaded multiple times
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

inertia:

You never said you were using ie lol

[quote=“Kihomura, post:5, topic:327132”][quote author=abraham2119 link=topic=423528.msg3109823#msg3109823 date=1264452583]
what browser

edit: try setting the ‘media’ attribute to ‘screen’ in your link tag
[/quote]
[size=80pt]Firefox[/size]; setting media to screen didn’t work[/quote]

eczema3:

I think ‘people’ mis-understand you issue, or you described it poorly to them. The “flash of unstyled content” is generally from IE, or IE based browser because of the way the stylesheet is loaded, it is done after the content is loaded, so for a brief moment sometimes you may see the flash.

http://www.webmasterworld.com/webmaster/3654847.htm
http://groups.google.com/group/jquery-en/browse_thread/thread/95465c4025cfd73d
http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=FOUC+firefox&aq=f&aql=&aqi=&oq=

Read full topic

I think ‘people’ mis-understand you issue, or you described it poorly to them. The “flash of unstyled content” is generally from IE, or IE based browser because of the way the stylesheet is loaded, it is done after the content is loaded, so for a brief moment sometimes you may see the flash.

item.title: Stylesheet not loading when page is reloaded multiple times
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

The problem has been solved, I had to add this into my 

<script type="text/javascript"> </script>

still feels like a “cheap fix” to me. also i found out that people refer to it as “flash of unstyled content”

inertia:

Does it work fine if you include the CSS in with the HTML using style tags?

Yes, it does

Read full topic

item.title: Stylesheet not loading when page is reloaded multiple times
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:

it may just be your browser caching the site in one of the fast refreshes, try disabling caching in firefox

item.title: Stylesheet not loading when page is reloaded multiple times
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Elijah:

it should be pretty obvious what the problem is, even to a novice

Sorry, I’m not very smart

eczema3:

Don’t refresh the page / click links on the page quickly then ?

I’m a perfectionist, if something is slightly wrong that nobody will ever notice, I still want it fixed

[quote=“abraham2119, post:2, topic:327132”]what browser

edit: try setting the ‘media’ attribute to ‘screen’ in your link tag[/quote]
Firefox; setting media to screen didn’t work

item.title: Stylesheet not loading when page is reloaded multiple times
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

If you refresh the page/click links on the page quickly, the page just reverts to the browser’s default stylesheet: http://i49.tinypic.com/149uypw.png

any ideas of what I’m doing wrong?

[code]


Page Name

<body>

    <div id="content">
        <?php include("incl/def/header.php"); ?>

        <div id="page">
            <div id="left">
                <?php
                    include("incl/def/title.php");
                    setTitle("Recent news");

                    include("incl/index/content.php");
                ?>
            </div>

            <div id="right">
                <?php include("incl/def/navigation.php"); ?>
            </div>

        </div>
    </div>

</body>
[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Stylesheet not loading when page is reloaded multiple times
